title: Just what you're looking for! 3 Bed / 2 Bath. Las Palmas Apartments
posting_body: ['Las Palmas Apartments', 'RENT:', '$1921 / MONTH', 'SIZE:', '1515', 'sq ft', 'BEDROOMS:', '3', 'BATHROOMS:', '2', 'LEASE TERMS:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'show contact info', 'UNIT FEATURES:', '− Carpet', '− Dishwasher', '− Disposal/Trash Compactor', '− Eat-in Kitchen', '− High Speed Internet Access', '− Oven', '− Patios or Balconies', '− Range', '− Refrigerator/Freezer', '− Tub/Shower', '− Custom Lighting', '− Designer Touches', '− Fireplaces in Select Apartment Homes', '− Full Size Washer Dryer Connections', '− Hardwood Floors', '− Premier Upgrade Unit', '− Spacious Layouts', '− Storage Units', '− Total Electric', '− Walk-In Closets', "There's plenty of shopping, dining, outdoor activities and more near Las Palmas Apartments.", "You'll love living in the Norcross location!", 'PROPERTY FEATURES:', '− Business Center', '− Fitness Center with Cardio Screens', '− Full Size Washer Dryer Connections', '− Gated Community', '− Picnic Area', '− Playground', '− Smoke Free', '− Sparkling Pool', '− Tennis Court', '− Great Location', '− Online Services', '− Pets Allowed', '− Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '− Resident Social Events', '− Screened In Patios', '− Serene Views', 'PET POLICY:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'VISIT OR CALL US TODAY!', '1 Seasons Pkwy', 'Norcross, GA 30093', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Admin Fee of 135 due upon application processing non refundable..', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'DD3014430A7F4E72']
